profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.6.2 Trigger events - Document
profile.description: The document catalog dictionary shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary

error.message: The document catalog dictionary contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)
